original: Netti
analyzed: na itti

original: Paṭiniddesavāra
analyzed: paṭiniddesa vāra

original: Vibhaṅga 8
analyzed: vibhaṅga

original: Vibhattihāravibhaṅga
analyzed: vibhatti hāra vibhaṅga

original: Tattha katamo vibhattihāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vibhatti hāro

original: “Dhammañca padaṭṭhānaṁ bhūmiñcā”ti.
analyzed: dhammam ca padaṭṭhānam bhūmim ca ati

original: Dve suttāni vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca.
analyzed: dve suttāni vāsanā bhāgiyañca nibbedha bhāgiyañca

original: Dve paṭipadā puññabhāgiyā ca phalabhāgiyā ca.
analyzed: dve paṭipadā puñña bhāgiyā ca phala bhāgiyā ca

original: Dve sīlāni saṁvarasīlañca pahānasīlañca, tattha bhagavā vāsanābhāgiyaṁ suttaṁ puññabhāgiyāya
analyzed: dve sīlāni savara sīlam ca pahāna sīlam ca tattha bhagavā vāsanābhāgiyam suttam puññabhāgiyāya

original: paṭipadāya desayati, so saṁvarasīle ṭhito tena brahmacariyena brahmacārī bhavati,
analyzed: paṭipadāya desayati saḥ savara sīle ṭhitaḥ tena brahmacariyena brahmacārī bhavati

original: tattha bhagavā nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ suttaṁ phalabhāgiyāya paṭipadāya desayati, so pahānasīle
analyzed: tattha bhagavā nibbedha bhāgiyam suttam phala bhāgiyāya paṭipadāya desayati saḥ pahāna sīle

original: ṭhito tena brahmacariyena brahmacārī bhavati.
analyzed: tena brahmacariyena brahmacārī bhavati

original: Tattha katamaṁ vāsanābhāgiyaṁ suttaṁ?
analyzed: tattha katamam vāsanābhāgiyam sutta

original: Vāsanābhāgiyaṁ nāma suttaṁ dānakathā sīlakathā saggakathā kāmānaṁ ādīnavo nekkhamme ānisaṁsoti.
analyzed: vāsanābhāgiyam nāma suttam dāna kathā sīla kathā sagga kathā kāmānam ādīnavaḥ nekkhamme ānisasaḥ ti

original: Tattha katamaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ suttaṁ?
analyzed: tattha katamam nibbedha bhāgiyam sutta

original: Nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ nāma suttaṁ yā catusaccappakāsanā, vāsanābhāgiye sutte natthi pajānanā, natthi maggo, natthi phalaṁ.
analyzed: nibbedhabhāgiyam nāma suttam yā catu sacca pakāsanā vāsanābhāgiye sutte natthi pajānanā natthi maggaḥ natthi phala

original: Nibbedhabhāgiye sutte atthi pajānanā, atthi maggo, atthi phalaṁ.
analyzed: nibbedha bhāgiye sutte atthi pajānanā atthi maggaḥ atthi phala

original: Imāni cattāri suttāni.
analyzed: imāni cattāri suttāni

original: Imesaṁ catunnaṁ suttānaṁ desanāya phalena sīlena brahmacariyena sabbato vicayena hārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojayitabbā yāvatikā ñāṇassa bhūmi.
analyzed: imesam catunnam suttānam desanāya phalena sīlena brahmacariyena sabbatas vicayena hārena vicinitvā yutti hārena yojayitabbā yāvatikā ñāṇassa bhūmi

original: Tattha katame dhammā sādhāraṇā?
analyzed: tattha katame dhammā sādhāraṇā

original: Dve dhammā sādhāraṇā nāmasādhāraṇā vatthusādhāraṇā ca.
analyzed: dve dhammā sādhāraṇāḥ nāma sādhāraṇāḥ vatthu sādhāraṇā ca

original: Yaṁ vā pana kiñci aññampi evaṁ jātiyaṁ, micchattaniyatānaṁ sattānaṁ aniyatānañca
analyzed: yam vā pana kiñci aññam pi evam jātiya micchatta niyatānam sattānam aniyatānam ca

original: sattānaṁ dassanappahātabbā kilesā sādhāraṇā, puthujjanassa sotāpannassa ca kāmarāgabyāpādā
analyzed: sattānam dassana ppahātabbā kilesā sādhāraṇā puthujjanassa sotāpannassa ca kāma rāga byāpādā

original: sādhāraṇā, puthujjanassa anāgāmissa ca uddhambhāgiyā saṁyojanā sādhāraṇā, yaṁ kiñci
analyzed: sādhāraṇā puthujjanassa anāgāmissa ca uddhambhāgiyā sayojanā sādhāraṇā yam kiñci

original: ariyasāvako lokiyaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpajjati, sabbā sā avītarāgehi sādhāraṇā, sādhāraṇā
analyzed: ariya sāvakaḥ lokiyam samāpattim samāpajjati sabbā sā avīta rāgehi sādhāraṇā sādhāraṇā

original: hi dhammā evaṁ aññamaññaṁ paraṁ paraṁ sakaṁ sakaṁ visayaṁ nātivattanti.
analyzed: hi dhammāḥ evam aññam aññam param param sakam sakam visayam na ativattanti

original: Yopi imehi dhammehi samannāgato na so taṁ dhammaṁ upātivattati.
analyzed: yaḥ api imehi dhammehi samannāgataḥ na saḥ tam dhammam upātivattati

original: Ime dhammā sādhāraṇā.
analyzed: ime dhammā sādhāraṇā

original: Tattha katame dhammā asādhāraṇā?
analyzed: tattha katame dhammā asādhāraṇā

original: Yāva desanaṁ upādāya gavesitabbā sekkhāsekkhā bhabbābhabbāti, aṭṭhamakassa sotāpannassa
analyzed: yāva desanam upādāya gavesitabbā sekkhā asekkhā bhabba abhabbā ati aṭṭhamakassa sotāpannassa

original: ca kāmarāgabyāpādā sādhāraṇā dhammatā asādhāraṇā, aṭṭhamakassa anāgāmissa ca uddhambhāgiyā
analyzed: ca kāma rāga byāpādā sādhāraṇā dhamma tā asādhāraṇā aṭṭhamakassa anāgāmissa ca uddhambhāgiyā

original: saṁyojanā sādhāraṇā dhammatā asādhāraṇā.
analyzed: sayojanā sādhāraṇā dhamma tā asādhāraṇā

original: Sabbesaṁ sekkhānaṁ nāmaṁ sādhāraṇaṁ dhammatā asādhāraṇā.
analyzed: sabbesam sekkhānam nāmam sādhāraṇam dhamma tā asādhāraṇā

original: Sabbesaṁ paṭipannakānaṁ nāmaṁ sādhāraṇaṁ dhammatā asādhāraṇā.
analyzed: sabbesam paṭipannakānam nāmam sādhāraṇam dhamma tā asādhāraṇā

original: Sabbesaṁ sekkhānaṁ sekkhasīlaṁ sādhāraṇaṁ dhammatā asādhāraṇā.
analyzed: sabbesam sekkhānam sekkha sīlam sādhāraṇam dhamma tā asādhāraṇā

original: Evaṁ visesānupassinā hīnukkaṭṭhamajjhimaṁ upādāya gavesitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam visesa anupassinā hīna ukkaṭṭham ajjhimam upādāya

original: Dassanabhūmi niyāmāvakkantiyā padaṭṭhānaṁ, bhāvanābhūmi uttarikānaṁ phalānaṁ pattiyā
analyzed: dassana bhūmi niyāma avakkantiyā padaṭṭhāna bhāvanā bhūmi uttarikānam phalānam pattiyā

original: padaṭṭhānaṁ, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā samathassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, sukhā paṭipadā
analyzed: padaṭṭhāna dukkhā paṭipadā dandhā abhiññā samathassa padaṭṭhāna sukhā paṭipadā

original: khippābhiññā vipassanāya padaṭṭhānaṁ, dānamayaṁ puññakiriyavatthu parato ghosassa
analyzed: khippa abhiññā vipassanāya padaṭṭhāna dāna mayam puñña kiriya vatthu paratas ghosassa

original: sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, sīlamayaṁ puññakiriyavatthu cintāmayiyā paññāya sādhāraṇaṁ
analyzed: sādhāraṇam padaṭṭhāna sīla mayam puñña kiriya vatthu cintā mayiyā paññāya sādhāraṇa

original: padaṭṭhānaṁ, bhāvanāmayaṁ puññakiriyavatthu bhāvanāmayiyā paññāya sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: padaṭṭhāna bhāvanā mayam puñña kiriya vatthu bhāvanā mayiyā paññāya sādhāraṇam padaṭṭhāna

original: Dānamayaṁ puññakiriyavatthu parato ca ghosassa sutamayiyā ca paññāya sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ
analyzed: dāna mayam puñña kiriya vatthu paratas ca ghosassa suta mayiyā ca paññāya sādhāraṇam padaṭṭhāna

original: sīlamayaṁ puññakiriyavatthu cintāmayiyā ca paññāya yoniso ca manasikārassa sādhāraṇaṁ
analyzed: sīla mayam puñña kiriya vatthu cintā mayiyā ca paññāya ca manasikārassa

original: padaṭṭhānaṁ, bhāvanāmayaṁ puññakiriyavatthu bhāvanāmayiyā ca paññāya sammādiṭṭhiyā
analyzed: padaṭṭhāna bhāvanā mayam puñña kiriya vatthu bhāvanā mayiyā ca paññāya sammādiṭṭhiyā

original: ca sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: ca sādhāraṇam padaṭṭhāna

original: Patirūpadesavāso vivekassa ca samādhissa ca sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, sappurisūpanissayo
analyzed: vivekassa ca samādhissa ca sādhāraṇam padaṭṭhāna sappurisa upanissayo

original: tiṇṇañca aveccappasādānaṁ samathassa ca sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, attasammāpaṇidhānaṁ
analyzed: tiṇṇam ca avecca ppasādānam samathassa ca sādhāraṇam padaṭṭhāna atta sammāpaṇidhāna

original: hiriyā ca vipassanāya ca sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, akusalapariccāgo kusalavīmaṁsāya
analyzed: hiriyā ca vipassanāya ca sādhāraṇam padaṭṭhāna akusala pariccāgo kusala vīmasāya

original: ca samādhindriyassa ca sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, dhammasvākkhātatā kusalamūlaropanāya
analyzed: ca samādhi indriyassa ca sādhāraṇam dhamma su ākkhāta tā kusala mūla ropanāya

original: ca phalasamāpattiyā ca sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, saṅghasuppaṭipannatā saṅghasuṭṭhutāya
analyzed: ca phala samāpattiyā ca sādhāraṇam saṅgha suppaṭipanna tā saṅgha suṭṭhu tāya

original: sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, satthusampadā appasannānañca pasādāya pasannānañca bhiyyobhāvāya
analyzed: sādhāraṇam padaṭṭhāna satthu sampadā appasannānam ca pasādāya pasannānam ca bhiyyobhāvāya

original: sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, appaṭihatapātimokkhatā dummaṅkūnañca puggalānaṁ niggahāya
analyzed: sādhāraṇam padaṭṭhāna appaṭihata pātimokkha tā dummaṅkūnam ca puggalānam niggahāya

original: pesalānañca puggalānaṁ phāsuvihārāya sādhāraṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: pesalānam ca puggalānam phāsu vihārāya sādhāraṇam padaṭṭhāna

original: Tenāha āyasmā mahākaccāyano “dhammañca padaṭṭhānan”ti.
analyzed: tena āha āyasmā mahākaccāyanaḥ dhammam ca padaṭṭhānam ti

original: Niyutto vibhatti hāro.
analyzed: niyuttaḥ vibhatti hāraḥ
